Failure \nEffects\n(Local, WEC, System): Loss of cooling capacity - resulting in reduced power generation, systems cooling, and/or total PTO systems shutdown
Post Failure\nDetection:
1) SCADA - temperature, pressure, flow sensors, water sensors in nacelle
2) Heat related component failure
3) Visual inspection
Post Failure\nRepair\nStrategy \n(automa: In-Situ repair if possible, if not, recover and repair

Failure \nEffects\n(Local, WEC, System): Loss or reduction of cooling capacity - resulting in reduced power generation, systems cooling, and/or total PTO systems shutdown
Risk Reduction \nDesign:
Filter/screen in cooling circuit.
Flush system during commissioning and prevent contamination during installation
Post Failure\nDetection:
1) SCADA - temperature, pressure, flow sensors
2) Heat related component failure
Post Failure\nRepair\nStrategy \n(automa: In-Situ repair if possible, if not, recover and repair

Failure \nEffects\n(Local, WEC, System): Loss of cooling capacity - resulting in reduced power generation, systems cooling, and/or total PTO systems shutdown
Risk Reduction \nDesign:
1) Marine rated components
2) Redundant pumps and controllers
Preventative\nDetection: 1) SCADA diagnostics - temperature, pressure, and flow sensors in coolant loop; pump current draw, water intrusion sensors
Post Failure\nRepair\nStrategy \n(automa: In-Situ repair if possible, if not, recover and repair

Failure \nEffects\n(Local, WEC, System): Loss of cooling capacity - resulting in reduced power generation, systems cooling, and/or total PTO systems shutdown
Risk Reduction \nDesign:
1) Vibration analysis
2) Equipment and installation designed for dynamic environment
3) Redundant pumps and controllers
Preventative\nDetection: 1) SCADA diagnostics - temperature, pressure, and flow sensors in coolant loop; pump current draw, vibration sensors
Post Failure\nDetection:
1) Smoke alarms - reduce time to electrically isolate 
2) Over-current protection - for electrical isolation
3) SCADA Diagnostics
4) Visual inspection
Post Failure\nRepair\nStrategy \n(automa: In-Situ repair if possible, if not, recover and repair

Function: Exchange cooling water heat with ocean water
Failure \nEffects\n(Local, WEC, System):
1) Flooding
2) Loss of cooling
3) Loss of PTO
Risk Reduction \nDesign:
1) Marine design/rated heat exchanger
2) V&V (QC)
3) Heat exchanger mount to inside of hull
Post Failure\nDetection:
1) SCADA - temperature, pressure, flow sensors, water sensors in nacelle
2) Heat related component failure
3) Visual inspection
